summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue Northwest, in the City of Seattle, from West Forty-fifth Street to West Forty-seventh Street, by planking the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2724 of the City Council of the City of Seattle; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
